definition: to infringe on/to encroach on/to violate/to assault
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

pinyin: shen2 sheng4 bu4 ke3 qin1 fan4

sentences.english: There are many cases of human rights violations filed before the police.
sentences.chinese: 警方接手许多人权侵犯案件，往往牵连到高级官员。

sentences.english: The law punishes people who invade the fights of others.
sentences.chinese: 法律惩罚侵犯他人权利的人。

sentences.english: And in the case of women, that often included sexual assault.
sentences.chinese: 如果女囚，还经常涉及到性侵犯。

sentences.english: The guy's depraved…Gets off on violating and humiliating all these women.
sentences.chinese: 这人够堕落最喜欢侵犯和羞辱这些女人。

sentences.english: A sovereign state would never allow other countries to violate its own territory.
sentences.chinese: 主权国的领土不容别国势力侵犯。

sentences.english: We outrage at the sinful violation of the poeple's interests and rights.
sentences.chinese: 我们对侵犯人民利益和权利的罪恶行经表示强烈愤慨。

sentences.english: Mr. Kamkar, however, said he did not create it to violate anyone’s privacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是Kamkar表示他没有打算侵犯任何人的隐私。

sentences.english: In fact, reporters had been warned beforehand about the potentially over-aggressive conduct.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，记者们在之前被警告过潜在的侵犯行为。

sentences.english: Retaliation only escalates a bully's aggression.
sentences.chinese: 报复只会升高施霸凌者的侵犯气焰。

sentences.english: The State protects the lawful rights and interests of schools and other institutions of education from infringement.
sentences.chinese: 国家保护学校及其他教育机构的合法权益不受侵犯。

sentences.english: The Soviet-German non-aggression treaty smashed this plot.
sentences.chinese: 这种阴谋，被苏德互不侵犯条约击破了。

sentences.english: Availability for prosecuting the behaviors of infringing national benefit or social public interests.
sentences.chinese: 侵犯国家利益或社会公共利益行为的可诉性。

sentences.english: In doing so, the US has violated international law and encroached upon China's sovereignty and territorial airspace.
sentences.chinese: 美机此举违反了国际法，侵犯了中国主权和领空。

sentences.english: Video-assisted thoracoscopy is a safer and less invasive modality of therapy.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔内视镜是一个安全且较不侵犯的治疗方式。

sentences.english: Calm and certainty have been replaced by aggression.
sentences.chinese: 平静和自信被敌意和侵犯取代了。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
